channel.title: Shop on Sometimes we write something:)
channel.description: Recent content in Shop on Sometimes we write something:)

item.title: Selling on OpenSky
item.description: <img src="/media/opensky_new-logo.png" alt="OpenSky" /> As anyone who reads my blog or follows my tweets knows, I’ve been working for a new startup called OpenSky since February 2010. We’ve launched a new ecommerce platform and aim to reinvent ecommerce as people know it online. One of the big things we are doing is making it so anyone can sell OpenSky products from anywhere online. In the spirit of eating my own dogfood, I’ve become an OpenSky seller.
